h3_title: Kang-Jin Star Boss Fight and Guide
content: Often after proclaiming "Tremors forge thunder" she can create electrical spots on the ground to erupt with lightning after a moment. The problem is these rings will follow you for a moment before she enacts the strike, so again you'll need to watch when she crackles with light to know the strike is coming and dodge it. At the start of the fight you'll only have to dodge one, but over time she'll do more and more of these for the first part of her attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Kang-Jin_Star.md', within the main section titled 'Kang-Jin Star', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Kang-Jin Star' and the sub-subsection 'Kang-Jin Star Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Often after proclaiming "Tremors forge thunder" she can create electrical spots on the ground to erupt with lightning after a moment. The problem is these rings will follow you for a moment before she enacts the strike, so again you'll need to watch when she crackles with light to know the strike is coming and dodge it. At the start of the fight you'll only have to dodge one, but over time she'll do more and more of these for the first part of her attack.
